data.oai_dc:dc: linear morphometric measurements of A_alluaudi LPJs

This file describes the linear measurements, and weight measurements made of lower pharyngeal jaws (LPJ), and standard lengths of the A. alluaudi specimens, as used in statistical analyses of LPJ size (Figure 3a-b, Table S3). Linear measurements are in mm and weight measurements are in mg. Specimen names correspond those assigned in Table S1.
